attributes.action: have more tv stations in the uk and local independant tv stations
attributes.additional_details: we would like the goverment to create more television stations around the uk

rejection.details:
The government doesn't actually create tv stations.  however, there should be some on their way

http://media.ofcom.org.uk/2013/06/19/ofcom-starts-second-phase-of-local-tv-licensing/

(see Ofcom website for more info)
